features.description: Added CSRF protection to all form submissions in the application to prevent cross-site request forgery attacks
features.aiPrompt:
Generate test cases for CSRF protection in Spring Security:
1. Test that forms without CSRF token are rejected
2. Test that forms with invalid CSRF tokens are rejected
3. Test that forms with valid CSRF tokens are accepted
4. Test CSRF token rotation after successful form submission

features.description: Added a logout feature that allows authenticated users to sign out
